doc:
Ray Meagher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Meagher 0 Raymond Francis Meagher (born 4 July 1944) is an Australian actor. He has appeared in Australian film and television since the mid-1970s, and is notable as the longest continuing performer in an Australian television role, as Alf Stewart on Home and Away, having played the role since the first episode in 1988. He is the only original actor still with the series. Meagher won the Gold Logie Award for his role in Home and Away in 2010. Meagher has currently played the role of Alf for over 30 years. Raymond_Francis_Meagher ( born 4_July_1944 ) is an_Australian_actor . He has_appeared in Australian_film_and_television since the_mid-1970s , and is notable as the_longest_continuing_performer in an_Australian_television_role , as Alf_Stewart on Home_and Away , having_played the_role since the_first_episode in 1988 . He is the_only_original_actor still with the_series . Meagher won the_Gold_Logie_Award for his_role in Home and Away in 2010 . Meagher has_currently_played the_role of Alf for over_30_years .
